title: register a new user successfully
description: Test the /api/v1/auth/register endpoint to ensure a new user can be registered with valid data and receives a 200 response confirming user creation.

title: login with valid credentials
description: Test the /api/v1/auth/login-json endpoint to verify that a user can login with valid credentials and receives a JWT token with a 200 response.

title: list all cases for a user
description: Test the GET /api/v1/cases endpoint to ensure it returns a list of cases associated with the authenticated user with a 200 response.

title: create a new immigration case
description: Test the POST /api/v1/cases endpoint to verify that a new immigration case can be created successfully and returns a 200 response with case details.

title: get case details by case id
description: Test the GET /api/v1/cases/{case_id} endpoint to retrieve detailed information of a specific case by its ID, expecting a 200 response or 404 if not found.

title: update an existing case
description: Test the PUT /api/v1/cases/{case_id} endpoint to update details of an existing case and verify a 200 response confirming the update.

title: delete a case by id
description: Test the DELETE /api/v1/cases/{case_id} endpoint to delete a specific case by its ID and confirm a 200 response indicating successful deletion.

title: upload a document successfully
description: Test the POST /api/v1/documents/upload endpoint to upload a document file securely and verify a 200 response confirming the upload.

title: list all uploaded documents
description: Test the GET /api/v1/documents endpoint to retrieve a list of all uploaded documents with a 200 response.

title: create a new person record
description: Test the POST /api/v1/persons endpoint to create a new person record and verify a 200 response confirming creation.
